story_parts.text: A lion was walking through the jungle when he came to a clearing. In the clearing was a city. The lion had never seen a city before and he was curious. He walked into the city and he saw all kinds of animals. He saw monkeys, elephants, and even a few lions. He walked around the city all day and he loved it.
